nodes.text: The Trogan system was a star system located within the Jospro sector of the Outer Rim Territories that contained the planet Trogan.

This was the location that Aves and the rest of Talon Karrde's organization had used in which to hole up after Karrde's imprisonment. Mara Jade was sent there to bring the smugglers to the Katana fleet ahead of Borsk Fey'lya's crew.
